event_history.title: PED Suspension
event_history.description: Player suspended for 4 games due to performance enhancing drugs.
event_history.impact: Player unavailable for specified number of games

event_history.title: Season Challenge
event_history.description: RB called himself 'Mr. 2K' and vowed to rush for 2,000 yards this season.
event_history.impact: If he doesn't reach 2,000 yards, drop dev trait by one level

event_history.title: Betting Scandal
event_history.description: Player caught betting on games and suspended for 16 games.
event_history.impact: Player unavailable for specified number of games

event_history.title: Early Retirement
event_history.description: A player has decided to retire early due to career change.

event_history.title: Poor Conditioning
event_history.description: Player showed up to training camp in bad condition.
event_history.impact: Lower stamina by 5, speed/acceleration by 1, and raise weight by 10

event_history.title: Early Retirement
event_history.description: A player has decided to retire early due to injury concerns.

event_history.title: Season Challenge
event_history.description: RB called himself 'Mr. 2K' and vowed to rush for 2,000 yards this season.
event_history.impact: If he doesn't reach 2,000 yards, drop dev trait by one level

event_history.title: Draft Pick Penalty
event_history.description: Team is penalized for recruitment violations and has their 1st round pick confiscated.
event_history.impact: When this pick comes up in the draft, select the lowest rated punter

event_history.title: Draft Pick Penalty
event_history.description: Team is penalized for illegal practice sessions and has their 4th round pick confiscated.
event_history.impact: When this pick comes up in the draft, select the lowest rated punter

event_history.title: Franchise Tag Holdout
event_history.description: Franchise tagged player is holding out for 2 games until a new contract is negotiated.
event_history.impact: Player unavailable for specified number of games
